name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT Queue - Save Time with Prompt Chains and Bulk Prompting

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Queue messages for your ChatGPT. Achieve maximum productivity with Prompt Chains and Bulk prompting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Introducing ChatGPT Queue! 🚀

🤖 Ever feel like you're just waiting...and waiting...for ChatGPT to reply? Say goodbye to downtime and hello to productivity with ChatGPT Queue, the Chrome extension that lets you queue up your messages in advance! 

Just type, hit Enter, and watch your messages line up like magic. 🎩✨


Why You'll Love ChatGPT Queue:
🕒 Save Time: No more waiting around. Queue your questions and keep your flow going!

🚀 Efficiency at Its Best: Multi-task like a pro. ChatGPT Queue works silently in the background, making every chat smoother and faster.

🎯 Easy to Use: Just load it up with ChatGPT, start typing, and your queue will build as you press Enter. It's that simple!

💬 Long Conversations, Better Answers:
Great answers come from great conversations. Queue your queries for accurate, in-depth insights.

🔍 Tailored for Detailed Inquiries:
Researching multiple items? Queue them individually for thorough details, avoiding missed specifics.


🌟 Go Pro for Unlimited Power:

🚀 Upgrade to the Pro version for an unlimited queue and Bulk prompting. Unlock endless possibilities with a one-time investment!

🛡️ 100% Cash-Back Guarantee: Not satisfied? Get your money back within the first 24 hours of purchase. No questions asked!

🌟 All ChatGPT Queue licenses also include a free Claude Queue license!

📚 Additional Resources:

🎥 Watch prompt chain use cases: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCyD2NSAxTX8LMheFJJEyhYQ

📋 Find prompt examples: https://github.com/MIATECHPARTNERS/PromptChains/blob/main/README.md

🚀 Get started guide: https://github.com/MIATECHPARTNERS/PromptChains/blob/main/Get_Started.md

📢 Pro Tips
- Select an item in the queue to delete it, it'll have a red underline.
- The queue will pause while you're typing, keep your text field empty to keep it rolling or enter some text to pause the queue.
- You can add multiple items into the queue from the extension menu with bulk prompting 
- The extension will automatically press "Continue Generating" for you
